entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 14 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
